onset.Description: Onset time of the first stimulus

duration.Description: Duration of trial from beginning of first stimulus to end of fixation

trial_type.Description: Category of trial based on stimuli characteristics

Levels.2_true_affirm: Argument with valid conclusion using affirmative language necessitating integration of 2 premises
Levels.3_true_affirm: Argument with valid conclusion using affirmative language necessitating integration of 3 premises
Levels.2_false_affirm: Argument with invalid conclusion using affirmative language necessitating integration of 2 premises
Levels.3_false_affirm: Argument with invalid conclusion using affirmative language necessitating integration of 3 premises
Levels.2_true_negate: Argument with valid conclusion with negation necessitating integration of 2 premises
Levels.3_true_negate: Argument with valid conclusion with negation necessitating integration of 3 premises
Levels.2_false_negate: Argument with invalid conclusion with negation necessitating integration of 2 premises
Levels.3_false_negate: Argument with invalid conclusion with negation necessitating integration of 3 premises

accuracy.Description: Indicates if participant made correct or incorrect response

response_time.Description: Subject response time measrured from beginning of presentation of second stimulus

premise1.Description: First premise of argument presented visually at beginning of trial

premise2.Description: Second premise of argument presented visually under first premise at 2s from beginning of trial

premise3.Description: Third premise of argument presented visually under second premise at 4s from beginning of trial

conclusion.Description: Conclusion of argument presented visually under third premise at 6s from beginning of trial

stim_file.Description: Location and name of auditory stimulus file presented at beginning of trial
